EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining our webinar on mental health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Understanding and bridging gaps in your clients’ mental health care offerings
Image Mature woman waving at tablet
We hope you enjoyed our recent webinar. We recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime. Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any additional questions about our virtual care solutions.
Watch now <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/62856efe7481c30551555cbe]]>
Watch our on-demand webinar to get: An overview of the mental health care landscape and the challenges it presents for small and mid-size employers A deep understanding of the coaching, clinical and crisis management components of our stepped-care approach Updates on mental health crisis management and adolescent mental health solutions
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
